## For Today:
1. Please make sure to sit with your group and login as normal.
2. Make sure you have each others' contact information.
3. Make sure you have one new GitHub repository for your group. All group members should be added as collaborators.
4. Bry and I will circulate and approve your data. 
5. Have your data imported into R and ready for us to look at.
6. While you wait for us, you should be exploring your data and thinking about how the kinds of questions/analyses you can do with it.
